snippet: The Sanrio character, who turns 40 this year, was the star of a suite of events that began on Wednesday at MOCA’s Geffen Contemporary. The photographer Jacqueline DiMilia captured the style scene in and around the show.
abstract: The Sanrio character, who turns 40 this year, was the star of a suite of events that began on Wednesday at MOCA’s Geffen Contemporary. The photographer Jacqueline DiMilia captured the style scene in and around the show.

headline.main: Scenes From the Hello Kitty Convention in Los Angeles
